summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder is a sheer, oil-free pressed powder that helps keep shine under control.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination, Combination Oily, Oily.Coverage: Moderate.Finish: Matte, Natural.Tested for streaking and fading at 88Â°F with a constant 80% humidity, all to prove Stay-Matte stays fresh.Patent-pending formula absorbs shine, controls oil, resists sweat.Lightweight, long-wearing. Leaves a matte finish.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2153956How To UseApply pressed powder with Powder Brush or included sponge applicator. Can be used all over face, or just on oily spots. Sponge applicator is washable with soap and water; allow to dry completely before next use.IngredientsTalc, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Calcium Stearate, Calcium Silicate, Silica, Trimyristin, Nylon-12, PPG-12 / Smdi Copolymer, Methicone, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Carmine (CI 75470), Manganese Violet (CI 77742).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply pressed powder with Powder Brush or included sponge applicator. Can be used all over face, or just on oily spots. Sponge applicator is washable with soap and water; allow to dry completely before next use.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments:
As a 5 minute make up gal, this powder foundation is amazing! I do use a primer, it just seems to help. Color is a perfect match, stays all day, helps control oil, and it over all just looks and feels really nice on the skin. 
I will continue to use this product.

reviews.headline: Love This Powder
reviews.comments: Started using this powder decades ago. It was the only product I tried that I wasn't allergic to. Haven't used anything else since.

reviews.headline: Clean and Smooth
reviews.comments: I buy this on repeat for smooth coverage and a clean finish. My skin is oily and Stay-Matte pressed powder keeps the shine down.  It is easy to find the right one because there are so many color choices.  I went into the store for a consult to be sure there was a good match.  Since then, I've been on repeat.  No complaints from this girl.

reviews.headline: its all good
reviews.comments: just purchase this item and so far so good! looks really natural on dark skin. please use a primer first.

reviews.headline: its all good
reviews.comments: just purchase this item and so far so good! looks really natural on dark skin. please use a primer first.

reviews.headline: Okay
reviews.comments: The product is okay, it wasn't the one I was looking for as they didn't have.

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: Great coverage with a nice price tag

reviews.headline: Compact was Dried Out
reviews.comments:
The first day when I used the compact the 
powdered contents cracked into pieces. I had to take it to my nearest Ulta store, which wasn't close, and return it for another. I think the compact was old. I couldn't find a date on the box.

reviews.headline: VERY DISAPPOINTED & VERY DISSATISFIED!
reviews.comments:
This is my THIRD purchase of this item only to have it CRUMBLE to where it's all fully out & not usuable! AGAIN, I will have to EXCHANGE this item in store! 

QUALITY has definitely DETERIORATED on this product. One more time I will return for an exchange. If this product dies it again, I will get my money back & find something else!

DISAPPOINTED!

reviews.headline: Not the same product
reviews.comments:
I have been buying this for years but have noticed in the last year it only lasts me a few weeks when in the past it has lasted at least double the time if not longer. After only it a couple times it starts to crumble and is soon used up. I bought 2 at christmas because
They were such a good deal finally pulled opened the second one yesterday after saving it. I used it yesterday went to use it today accidently dropped it on my bathroom floor that is vinyl not even tile and it shattered. I am so upset i only used it once! The cosr of these have gone up so much and only last a few weeks. What ever you do dont drop it because it will disinigrate right before your eyes! I al now on tye search for a much cheaper longer lasting product.

reviews.headline: Great item
reviews.comments: Great item, I like the soft shades & how it feels on my face.

reviews.headline: Loved it!!!!
reviews.comments: This press powder is amazing!! It makes my skin feel so good and doesn't give me that dry look and feeling. The girl who helped me was so nice and kind. She knew what I needed and it helped me a lot.

reviews.headline: This is a wonderful compact. I keep one in my makeup drawer
reviews.comments: I  have been using this compact for many years. I keep one in my purse and one at home.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I had to stop wearing liquid makeup due to how dry my face is it always peeled off. This powder has plenty coverage and feels lite on my face. I highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: Just what I needed!
reviews.comments: Ulta discontinued what I was using and this was a perfect replacement

reviews.headline: My standby powder
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin, so years ago I talked with the Clinique rep in-store, and she recommended this powder. I've been using it for years! It's never made me break out, or had any adverse affects to my skin. Definitely my fav!

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: Would like to return but can't locate receipt

reviews.headline: Frequently purchase Clinique at this location
reviews.comments: Well stocked Clinique aisle in the store. Approached by sales person inquiring if I needed assistance. Perfect shade for my complexion. Very pleasant experience.

reviews.headline: I do not recommend this does not work for oily skin
reviews.comments: Worked and event and had to Rip this off and reapply the cheap stuff because this made my face makeup separate

reviews.headline: Works great for me!
reviews.comments: This gives me coverage that covers the shine on my face.  I've been buying this for years.

media.headline: I would definitely purchase this product again
media.caption: Age 50 + this product=aging backwards

media.headline: I've been using stay Nutmeg for years
Love Clinique products this is great on my sensitive skin

faceoff_positive.comments: This product offers good coverage, absorbs oil, controls shine and allows for touch-ups during the day without icky build-up. Good for really oily skin.
faceoff_positive.headline: Good Coverage

faceoff_negative.comments: I usually love this product, but I got one with the new packaging last month and it was terrible. I'm not sure if I just got a bad batch or if the formula changed with the new packaging as well, but the powder started cracking after just a few uses and turned in to a crumbly mess! I am now having to reorder much sooner because of all the wasted product that cracked and fell out. I'm going to try again with the hopes it was a fluke, but if it happens again I will have to find a new product. Clinique powder is too pricey to have it only last a few weeks.
faceoff_negative.headline: I usually love this product, but I got one with the new
